author: Ryan McCoy
message:
feat(project): initialize spine-core package [FOUNDATIONAL]

What:
- Initialize pyproject.toml with zero dependencies
- Add package structure with py.typed marker

Why:
- Establish stdlib-first foundation

Tags: bootstrap, project
Markers: FOUNDATIONAL

Impact: public_api
Migration: none
Feature-Type: infrastructure
Domain: developer_experience

author: Ryan McCoy
message:
feat(core/primitives): add enums, protocols, errors [FOUNDATIONAL]

What:
- Add shared domain enumerations
- Add canonical protocol definitions
- Add structured error hierarchy

Why:
- Establish contracts before implementations
- Single source of truth for all protocols

Tags: enum, protocol, errors
Markers: FOUNDATIONAL

Impact: public_api
Migration: none
Feature-Type: protocol
Domain: pipeline_state
Surfaces: Connection, RunStatus, SpineError

docstrings.spine/core/enums.py:
Shared domain enumerations.

Stability: stable
Tier: none
Since: 0.1.0
Dependencies: stdlib-only
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE
Tags: enum, domain
docstrings.spine/core/protocols.py:
Canonical protocol definitions for spine-core.

Stability: stable
Tier: none
Since: 0.1.0
Dependencies: stdlib-only
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE, ADR
Tags: protocol, connection, database, dispatcher

This module defines the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH for all structural
protocols used across spine-core.

Architecture::

    protocols.py
    ├── Connection      — sync DB protocol
    ├── AsyncConnection — async DB protocol
    └── StorageBackend  — sync storage protocol
docstrings.spine/core/errors.py:
Structured error types for spine-core.

Stability: stable
Tier: basic
Since: 0.1.0
Dependencies: stdlib-only
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE
Tags: errors, exceptions

author: Ryan McCoy
message:
feat(core/cache): add caching abstraction with memory backend [NEW]

What:
- Add CacheBackend protocol
- Add InMemoryCache with TTL support

Why:
- Enable cache-aside pattern across spines
- Start with zero-dependency in-memory backend

Tags: cache, backend, memory
Markers: NEW

Impact: public_api
Migration: none
Feature-Type: infrastructure
Architecture: caching
Domain: pipeline_state
Surfaces: CacheBackend, InMemoryCache

docstrings.spine/core/cache.py:
Caching abstraction with multiple backend implementations.

Stability: stable
Tier: basic
Since: 0.2.0
Dependencies: optional: redis
Doc-Types: TECHNICAL_DESIGN, API_REFERENCE
Tags: cache, backend, redis, memory

Provides a unified CacheBackend protocol with in-memory and Redis
implementations.

author: Ryan McCoy
message:
feat(core/adapters): add database adapter framework [NEW]

What:
- Add DatabaseAdapter ABC with adapter registry
- Add SQLite adapter as default backend

Why:
- Enable multi-backend database support
- Registry pattern for adapter discovery

Tags: adapter, database, registry
Markers: NEW

Impact: public_api
Migration: none
Feature-Type: data_layer
Architecture: adapter_pattern, repository_pattern
Domain: pipeline_state
Surfaces: DatabaseAdapter, AdapterRegistry
Sidecar: true

docstrings.spine/core/adapters/registry.py:
Database adapter registry and factory.

Stability: stable
Tier: basic
Since: 0.2.0
Dependencies: stdlib-only
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE

author: Ryan McCoy
message:
feat(core): add feature flags and secrets [NEW]

What:
- Add thread-safe feature flag registry
- Add secrets resolver with pluggable backends

Why:
- Enable runtime feature toggling
- Secure secrets management without env var sprawl

Tags: feature_flags, secrets, security
Markers: NEW

Impact: public_api
Migration: none
Feature-Type: infrastructure
Architecture: plugin_system
Domain: feature_flags, secrets_management
Surfaces: FeatureFlagRegistry, SecretsResolver

docstrings.spine/core/feature_flags.py:
Thread-safe feature flag registry.

Stability: experimental
Tier: basic
Since: 0.4.0
Dependencies: stdlib-only
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE, TECHNICAL_DESIGN
Tags: feature_flags, registry, thread_safe

Provides a simple but thread-safe feature flag system.

```mermaid
classDiagram
    class FeatureFlagRegistry {
        +register(name, default)
        +is_enabled(name) bool
        +set_override(name, value)
        +clear_overrides()
    }
```
docstrings.spine/core/secrets.py:
Secrets resolver with pluggable backends.

Stability: experimental
Tier: standard
Since: 0.4.0
Dependencies: optional: redis
Doc-Types: API_REFERENCE, GUIDE
Tags: secrets, security, pluggable

Provides a Secrets resolver that supports multiple backends:
environment variables, file-based, and vault-based.

author: Ryan McCoy
message:
fix(core/cache): handle TTL expiry edge case

What:
- Fix race condition in TTL expiry check

Why:
- Cache.get() could return expired entries under contention

Tags: cache, bugfix

Impact: behavior
Migration: none
